The name of the VAT (Value Added Tax) ap: Igama le-VAT (Intela Yokwengeza Inani) efakwe kuphrothokhuthi.
If the system does not find an existing: Uma uhlelo lungatholi i-VAT ekhona, luzokwakha ngokuzenzakalelayo entsha bese luhlunga izinga ngokusekelwe ku-VAT (%) oyinikezile esigabeni.
The percentage of VAT (Value Added Tax): Iphesenti le-VAT (Intela Yokwengeza Inani) efakwe kuphrothokhuthi.
Whether the VAT is added on top of the p: Uma i-VAT ifakwa phezulu kwentengo (okuhlukile) noma isivele ifakiwe kwintengo (okuhlanganisiwe).
